title: ബാലചന്ദ്രന്‍ ചുള്ളിക്കാടിന്റെ കവിതകള്‍ | Balachandran Chullikkadinte Kavithakal
description: Five poetry books - Pathinettu Kavithakal, Amavasi, Gazal, Manasantharam and Dracula - by Balachandran Chullikkad in a single collection. This book has all his famous poems including Yathramozhi, Oru Pranayageetham, Maappusakshi, Pokoo Priyappetta Pakshi, Gazal, Vyrthamasathile Kashtarathri, Aanandadhara, Sahasayanam, Evide John, Manasantharam, Mother Theresaykku Maranamundenkil etc.Avatharika by Satchidanandan.
author: Balachandran Chullikkad
